nodes.name: HTML to Image (HCTI)
nodes.notes: Sign up at htmlcsstoimage.com - Free 50 images/month

parameters.content: ## 3. Confirm and post directly to LinkedIn

## Automated LinkedIn Post Designer with N8N Integration

## How it works
- Upload your portrait and post quote in the webform - attached link to the webform below
- Webhook receives the form data
- Parse form Data, convert the image to base64 image
- Create HTML Design: create the design from 6 ready templates, all in HTML
- HTML to image: convert the code to an image and download
- Reduce image size, generate captions using OpenAI API
- Output response to view in webform
- Edit captions in webform and post to LinkedIn directly

## Setup
1. Get the web form attached below
2. Match both webhooks in the form to send data
3. Get [html css to image](https://htmlcsstoimage.com/) API and match in HTML to image (HCTI) http request node - Basic Auth
4. Get [OpenAI](https://platform.openai.com/settings/) API and insert into ChatGPT http request node - Header parameters
5. Create [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/) credential and match the Create a post LinkedIn node

## [Link to the webform](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1c2fuxuJXt-eV3qM4aW48H0CVebA1js1j/view?usp=sharing)

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value:
={{ [
  {
    role: 'system',
    content: 'You are an expert Linkedin caption writer. Write in an educative, inspirational, motivating, and informative tone. Never use em dashes. Keep it authentic, engaging, and conversion-focused.'
  },
  {
    role: 'user',
    content: 'Write a compelling linkedin caption for this quote: "' + $json.quote + '"

Requirements:
- Tone: Educative, inspirational, motivating, informative
- NO em dash allowed anywhere
- Length: 100-150 words
- Start with an attention-grabbing hook
- Expand on the quote meaning or practical application
- End with a clear call-to-action or thought-provoking question
- Add 5-7 highly relevant hashtags
- Make it personal and relatable
- No fluff, just value

Format:
[Hook line]

[Main content - 2-3 short paragraphs]

[CTA or question]

[Hashtags separated by spaces]'
  }
] }}

parameters.content: ## 1. Receive data from webform, process and generate design
## 2. Generate caption and send response back to webform
